group.name: wizard.selection
group.item:
The wizards on this page can create a variety of files and other objects based on the component you have selected. Please choose the type of wizard you want to use.
Note: Wizards that create Java source code files will try to preserve modifications you have made to the existing source file if you have followed the Java activity or bean source code guidelines described in the user's manual. However, we recommend saving the original file before invoking the generation process.

group.name: wizard.result
group.item: Merge generated content with existing output file
Overwrite existing output file with generated content

No template class files have been found in the following directories or its sub directories: $0 Please compile the template source files and press the 'Back' and then the 'Next' button to rescan the template directories.
Choose the template set you want to use for the generation and start the generator by pressing the 'Run generator' button.
Performing the generation process. Hold on, please.
The generation process was sucessfully performed. Press Cancel to exit the assistant or Back to choose another generation on the selected item(s).
Errors occured during the generation process. Please see the text box below for details.
Component properties that might be relevant for the generator have been modified, but the generator has not been run yet. Are you sure you want to close the dialog?

The file
$0
already exists. Do you want to overwrite the file or merge the new content with the content of the existing file?
Note: In HTML files, merging will replace the text between the '{{* and }}*' tags only, in other files (e. g. Java source), all text outside the tags will be replaced.
